text: adhkr -ayha alrswl- ma kan min 'amr maryam wamha wabnaha eisaa ealayh alslam; ltrdd bdhlk ealaa min adeuu 'ulwhyt eisaa 'aw bnwwath lilah sbhanh, 'iidh qalat aimra'at eimran hin hmlt: ya rbb 'iiniy jaealat lak ma fi batni khalisana lk, likhidma "byt almqds", ftqbbal mny; 'iinak 'ant whdk alsamie ldeayy, alealim bnyty
